Description: A kayaker has said he thought he was going to die when he was swallowed by a humpback whale.

Title: Trump wants Russia back in G7 - as NATO warned of 'darkest times' since WW2
Description: Donald Trump has said he would love to have Russia return to the G7 group of advanced economies, and that expelling the country 'was a mistake'.

Title: Chancellor in danger of squandering new year fightback and becoming 'reshuffle Rachel'
Description: To Opposition MPs, she's 'Rachel from Accounts'.

Title: Farage explores criminal claim over NatWest debanking
Description: The Reform UK leader Nigel Farage is exploring launching private criminal proceedings against NatWest Group over the debanking scandal which resulted in the lender's former chief losing her job.

Title: Blame game of the past' not helpful on coal tips safety, deputy FM says
Description: The deputy first minister of Wales has said the 'blame game of the past' on coal tips is not 'helpful'.

Title: Save my father's life': Why case of jailed British tycoon is major sticking point for Starmer's relations with China
Description: The UK government is facing increasing pressure to call on China to release jailed pro-democracy campaigner Jimmy Lai as it seeks closer trading ties with Beijing.

Title: Two British citizens detained in Iran
Description: Two British citizens have been detained in Iran, the government has said.

Title: What we know about Munich car ramming incident
Description: At least 28 people are injured after a car drove into a crowd in Munich, police have said.

Title: Suspected car attack in Munich will fill Germans with dread
Description: Confirmation that police are investigating the Munich car crash as a 'suspected attack' will fill Germans with dread and add fuel to an already highly emotional election debate.

Title: Ukraine has every reason to be worried after Trump's comments
Description: You should always give peace a chance. That US President Donald Trump 'thinks out of the box' is already the cliche of the moment.

Title: Today is the big one': Trump says he will unveil 'reciprocal' trade tariffs
Description: US President Donald Trump says he will unveil 'reciprocal' trade tariffs on Thursday, adding: 'Today is the big one'.

Title: Regulators may be cut down as government guns for growth
Description: The Business Secretary Jonathan Reynolds has indicated the number of regulators overseeing British industry and commerce could be reduced as part of the government's pursuit of economic growth.
